com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr

Class PaymentTokenV2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.LevelUpCode
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.PaymentTokenV2

  • @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class PaymentTokenV2
extends LevelUpCode

    Class to encompass the logic to encode V2 payment tokens combined with PaymentPreferencesV3 data.

    Looks like (base 36 encoded):

    LU0201234671234567890123030002LU
